Library

    Vehicles, Experiments in Synthetic Psychology

  • By Valentino Braitenberg
  • Text for the exploration of the behavior and awareness of robotic beings. Through a theoretical robot, text demonstrates the complexity of characteristics and psychological interpretations created from simple mechanisms and behaviors.

    • Roadside Picnic

  • By Arkady and Boris Strugatsky
  • Text for the exploration of the behavior and awareness of robotic beings. Through a theoretical robot, text demonstrates the complexity of characteristics and psychological interpretations created from simple mechanisms and behaviors.
